img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 31.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/77/Wukong_Bitter_31.jpg)
Another bat is hiding up ahead on the left in front of a Celestial Pear Tree, but with its back turned you can sneak up and unleash a charged strike first -- so long as you watch out for the Frozen Corpses around it.
img_below_text:
Past a third bat facing a Frozen Corpse censor holder, you'll see the main skeletal remains of the once great Snake General: friend to Turtle General, who was apparently tortured and killed by Yellowbrow.
![Wukong Bitter 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/52/Wukong_Bitter_33.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 66 from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md'.

Another bat is hiding up ahead on the left in front of a Celestial Pear Tree, but with its back turned you can sneak up and unleash a charged strike first -- so long as you watch out for the Frozen Corpses around it."
            - Following Text: "Past a third bat facing a Frozen Corpse censor holder, you'll see the main skeletal remains of the once great Snake General: friend to Turtle General, who was apparently tortured and killed by Yellowbrow.
![Wukong Bitter 33.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/52/Wukong_Bitter_33.jpg)"

img_summary: This image depicts a snowy battlefield in *Black Myth: Wukong*, where the protagonist Wukong is engaging a bat-like enemy near the skeletal remains of a massive creature, likely the Snake General mentioned in the following text. The environment includes frozen corpses and a large ribcage structure, contributing to the eerie and desolate atmosphere. The image serves to illustrate the progression of the narrative, highlighting the combat encounter and the ominous setting tied to the tortured Snake General's backstory.
